problems.title: Subset Sum Exists (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given an array of N integers and a target sum K, determine if there exists a subset of the array whose sum is exactly K, using recursion.

Input Format:
First line: N and K.
Second line: N integers.

Output Format:
Print "YES" if such a subset exists, otherwise "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
4 5
1 2 3 4

Sample Output
YES
(2+3 or 1+4)

Sample Input
3 7
2 4 6

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: At each index, you can include or exclude the element: subsetSum(n-1,k) OR subsetSum(n-1,k-arr[n-1]).
